2 BHK PG HOUSE FOR FEMALE MEDICAL STUDENTS @ 7500/PERSON
description: EXCLUSIVE PG ACCOMMODATION FOR FEMALE MEDICAL STUDENTS & WORKING WOMEN
Our newly constructed, fully furnished, 1200 sq ft spacious 2 BHK residence boasts 2 attached bathrooms, a combined living and dining space, and a kitchen.
Conveniently situated opposite Calicuts most sought after residential space -  Vrindavan Colony, Chevayur.
The place comfortably houses up to 4 guests in 2 bedrooms ( 2 guests in each bedroom)
- Amenities: TV, Washing machine, Fridge, Gas stove.
- Furnishings: Bed with cot, Wardrobes, Dining table, Living sofa, Study table & Chairs
- 3 kms / 7 mins to Calicut Medical College
- 6 kms / 15 mins to Baby Memorial Hospital junction
- 8 kms / 20 mins to Calicut railway station
- 250 metres / 3 min walk to the nearest super market & 1.2 kms / 5 mins to Reliance super market

For Rent: Houses & Apartments in Kozhikode

12.5 cent Land with building for Sale in Kozhikode Corp.
description: Four units of 3 BHK residential apartments  in one building  consisting of 12.5 cent land for sale in Kozhikode corporation area approx  6 km from Kozhikode city. Each apartment has 3 Bed rooms, 2 Toilets, Hall, Sit out, Kitchen and Work area and two entrance in the front side  (Two flats in each floor of a 2 storied building).  Plinth area of  4 unit is 3602 sq ft  and 361 sq ft of  stair case (Total plinth area=3963 sq ft).

There is enough space for parking and kids playing.   The building has approx. 25 meter approach road from main road (Beypore –Kozhikode main road which is going to upgrade as Beypore port to Kozhikode NH). Since the property is in  the heart of the town and Kozhikode city is just 6 km (10 minute drive) away from Arakinar town,  the building  has high  potential to have a regular monthly income for those who are seeking an investment plan. The property can be utilized to run various business portfolios such as  training /education / tuition centre or as boys hostel or girls hostel or as working women’s hostel or  as residential apartments after suitable modification and renovation. WELL water and corporation water is available in the property. The asking price is 14 Lakhs/cent – (Negotiable)
Serious buyers are kindly requested to respond to this Ad at the earliest.
